NAEB HEADQUARTERS
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D.C.
MEMORANDUM
TO: NAEB Board of Directors
NAEB Publications Committee
FROM: Harold E. Hill
DATE: April 23, 19o3
At the business meeting held at the Region III meeting in Chicago last
month, those NAEB members present took certain action in connection with
NAEB publications which they requested be passed along to the Board and
the Publications committee.
The group voted (l3 - 12) that Region III recommend to the NAEB Beard of
Directors that the Journal be a trade association publication and that when
feasible a professional journal be established.
The group further suggested that the staff seek a vote on this matter at
other regional meetings. However, the only one held since that time was
the Region II meeting in Tampa, at which no business sessions were held,
therefore there was no opportunity to discuss the matter or take a vote.
